name: Necati Coşkunçopur
introDescription: I build fast, scalable, and reliable web applications with a focus on clean design and seamless user experience.
aboutDescription: I’m a Full Stack Developer who values structure, consistency, and clean code. I approach every project with discipline and attention to detail to deliver reliable and scalable web applications.

education.description: I studied Operating Room Services at Ufuk University, where I gained valuable experience in teamwork, precision, and process management — skills that have positively influenced my approach to software development and project organization.

I graduated from Ulus Anatolian Technical High School, Computer Science/Web Development Branch in June 2012, where I gained foundational knowledge in database management and programming, including C#.

experience.name: 90 Pixel
experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description: At 90 Pixel, I developed a micro-learning web application designed to help companies deliver short, engaging educational content to their employees. The platform was built using React, Next.js, TypeScript, and styled-components, focusing on scalability, performance, and a clean, consistent user experience. I implemented reusable UI components, responsive layouts, and optimized rendering through Next.js features, resulting in a fast, maintainable, and visually cohesive learning solution for corporate training.
